name: DOOMSCROLLER
description:
Shoot the correct reactions to gain social approval, while avoiding or blocking the ads to keep your energy levels up. Use left and right arrow keys to move around social media space. Avoid or dispel posts and ads before they push you to the top and make you lose energy (making connections on social media is tiring). Use space to zoom fast.

Made for Unijam 2020!
